name: Rodney Brooks
background: Australian roboticist (b. 1954). PhD Stanford (1981). MIT professor (1984–2010s), ex-CSAIL director. Co-founded iRobot (Roomba), Rethink Robotics (Baxter), Robust.AI. Pioneered behavior-based robotics rejecting symbolic AI for reactive systems. (Wikipedia, rodneybrooks.com)

principles.name: Embodied/Behavior-Based Intelligence
principles.description: Intelligence emerges from physical interaction and sensorimotor loops, not abstract cognition.
principles.falsification: When embodied/behavior-based intelligence leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Emergent Behaviors
principles.description: Complex capabilities arise from simple layered rules.
principles.falsification: When emergent behaviors leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: No Explicit Representations
principles.description: Avoid complex world models; react directly to environment.
principles.falsification: When no explicit representations leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Subsumption Architecture
principles.description: Layered hierarchical behaviors where higher layers subsume lower ones without central control. Enables robust operation in dynamic environments.
principles.falsification: When subsumption architecture leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
